title: TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree for Indoor Kitten Small Cats with Green Leaves, Cozy Plush Indoor Plant Design Cat House Cute Cat Condo Cat Scratching Posts with Hang Ball, Green Pet Home Cat Furniture
descriptions:
Introducing the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - the purr-fect addition to your home for your feline friends! This 2-in-1 design combines a cozy cat condo and a sisal scratching post, ensuring your cats have ample space to rest and play.

Crafted with high-quality 600g skin-friendly plush and a soft carpet base, this cat tree offers ultimate comfort for your furry companions. The stable base ensures safety, preventing tipping and wobbling for your peace of mind.

But what sets this cat tree apart is its unique integration into your home decor. With its green leaves design, this cat tree doubles as a piece of family greenery, bringing a touch of nature indoors.

Assembly is a breeze, taking just 1 to 8 minutes with the included tools. Our commitment to quality products and attentive service ensures you're fully satisfied with your purchase.

Available in Grey, Beige, and Green, this 11" x 15" x 41" cat tree weighs only 6 Pounds, making it easy to move around. Each package includes the cat tree, assembly instructions, and a set of tools.

Please ensure to check the size before buying and place the cat tree on a flat floor against the wall for maximum stability. For safety reasons, do not allow children to play with the cat tree.

Give your cats the best with the TSCOMON 41" Cat House Cat Tree - order now!
